title: Why We Don’t Care
author: VD
content_html:
I have to admit, all of Trump’s squawking about definitely possibly being arrested last Tuesday leaves me entirely cold. This Stonetoss comic pretty much encapsulates my feelings on the matter. Unless there is some deeper level to this that is hidden from us, such as all of the January 6th arrestees being federal plants or something even more esoteric, I don’t know how anyone, least of all Donald Trump, can defend his refusal to pardon his followers instead of thugs and rappers.

DISCUSS ON SG
